5TAfWD.translation: In today's digital world, sharing images has become a common part of our daily lives. Whether it's personal photos, family pictures, or photos you want to share with friends or clients, watermarking is a simple yet effective way to protect your images from unauthorized use. By applying watermarks directly on your device, you can ensure that your images stay private and secure, without the need to upload them to external servers.
